EmailTemplate.name: 2016 PG/YP TCKO Correction comms - Lambeth B Su 8
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS – Important Timetable Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
NCS – important timetable update
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
You may have noticed that the start time and meeting point for Part 2 of NCS previously said ‘TBC’ on your timetable. We wanted to let you know that we have now updated this. Please click here to see your updated timetable:
https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/assets/Lambeth_B_Su_8__TT.pdf
We hope this information is helpful. Please do get in touch with us on the details below if you have any questions.
We look forward to seeing you on the first day of NCS!
The NCS Team – The Challenge Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW

You are receiving this email because you have registered your interest for NCS. Want to update your preferences or unsubscribe? Please email us at contact@ncsthechallenge.org or call us on 0203 542 2400.
